Name: [color=green]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]Hello? Can you hear me?

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]Wha... what?

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]Oh good, you can. Whew! I was beginning to worry there.

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]Can you see everything alright?

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]It might take you a moment to adjust to the light.

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]Wait a minute... Where...?

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]We're there? We've arrived at Antioch V?

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]Well, not quite... We still have approximately 58 days until we reach our destination.

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]What do you mean? Why am I awake if we're not at the new colony yet?

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]Wellllllll...

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]We were told you had a little bit of engineering experience, and what with our mechanic having gone missing, we thought-

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]Missing?

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]Yes, missing. The ship is already short-staffed, so we'd like you to step in.

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]And before you ask, it's all in your contract: the crew of the Fram II are allowed to wake passengers from cryosleep in the event of an urgent ship situation.

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]Will you help?

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]Doesn't look like I have much of a choice.

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]Fantastistk! I knew you'd come around.

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]Don't worry, our mechanic has... [i]{had}[/i] an assistant droid that should be able to show you around. It'll tell you what needs fixing and how to get started.

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]I believe the droid is stored in that maintenance cabin over there. Good luck!

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]Wait! That's it?

Name: [color=black]Ingrid
Text: [color=black]Sorry, important ship matters to attend to. Ha det bra!

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]That's just great... Sign up for a nice long jaunt in cryosleep and wake up two months early!

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]Better early than never, I suppose...

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]Guess I'd better find that droid.
